# indirectPointerTouchModes

**Instance Property**

The modes available for a user to select.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency var indirectPointerTouchModes: [PaperMarkupViewController.TouchMode] { get set }
```

## Discussion

Default is `[.selection, .drawing]`
